summary: Mr A, a fearless thief, steals valuable artefacts and teams up with the girl he is attracted to but who cannot be trusted. Close on their heels are three police officers trying to apprehend them.
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Abhishek Bachchan|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Uday Chopra|Bipasha Basu|Rimi Sen|Trishla Baid|Nikio|Railey|Harry|James|Taufrique|Yusuf Hussain|Arjun Sablok|Samer Shardh|Mohit Chauhan|Rashmi Kulkarni|Sahil Sajaj|Andre|Mohit Chauhan|Simon Laroque|Shree Rammy Pandey
title: Dhoom:2
